state_analysis: The directory '/mnt' already exists, but the attempt to mount the CD-ROM at '/dev/cdrom' failed, indicating that the system may not recognize the CD-ROM device or it might not be correctly set up in the QEMU environment.
explanation: We will check for the available block devices to see if the CD-ROM is recognized. This will help us determine if the CD-ROM is set up correctly or if we need to adjust the QEMU command. We will list the contents of the '/dev' directory to find available block devices.
